= Get the code =
See [Testing] page on how to get the code.

= Adding features/fixing bugs =
Change the code, run tests, and test your changes with Chromium checkout.

= Code reviews =
We use [https://codereview.appspot.com/ appspot] for code review. Use [https://codereview.appspot.com/static/upload.py upload.py] script to get your changes into appspot. If you don't have commit access one of the owners will land the patch for you after the review is done.
